chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 is experiencing the issue above.

Thank you for your help,

Once the package is received, the seller has 3 business days (5 if it's a laptop or home appliance) to replace or repair your product. Or, 2 business days to process its refund (if you're eligible).

A return is considered complete when the customer has met all the following conditions:
✔ Confirms that the product has not been repaired by someone else and has not suffered any damage due to a fall or exposure to water.
✔ Has confirmed having a return label.
✔ Understands they must include accessories and proof of purchase in their package.
✔ Understands it has 14 days to use the return label.

Reminder: Once received, the seller has 3 business days (5 if it's a laptop or home appliance) to replace or repair your product. Or, 2 business days to process its refund (if you're eligible).

Dear Backcare,

We have contacted our logistics partner about the cancellation of the order. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

The order has been successfully cancelled and the customer has been refunded.

Regards,
JY
